scope.description:
All web content of the public website of NAV located at 
https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/ which is a service available for the (Norwegian) public to calculate child support almost as NAV would do it. No login required or available.
scope.title: Bidragskalkulator

defineScope.additionalEvaluationRequirements:
- The report will include a list of all errors identified by the evaluator, rather than examples only.
- The evaluation will cover all web pages and web content of the website, rather than a selected sample only.

https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/detaljertBeregning

1  Alert(s) Heading level skipped
(headingLevelSkipped)
Description: One or more heading levels were skipped or used out of order.

• WCAG 2.0 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships External link
• WCAG 2.1 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships 


10  Alert(s) Unknown table purpose
(unknownTablePurpose)
Description: It was not possible to determine if the <table> is used for data or layout.

• WCAG 2.0 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships External link
• WCAG 2.1 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships

result.description: When focus on an element using the keyboard, the application makes that focus more visible. When focus is on the very few links in the application using mouse pointer, the focus is not so visible except for the mouse pointer hand, could probably be improved.

reportFindings.summary:
The following will be corrected:
* 1.3.1: Info and Relationships
* 1.3.5: Identify Input Purpose
The following will be improved:
* 1.4.11: Non-text Contrast
reportFindings.title: Evaluation Report for Bidragskalkulator
reportFindings.evaluationSpecifics:
About the application ===================== Written in an elderly web framework and will be rewritten in 2023. Tested pages ============ https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/innledning https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/underholdskostnad https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/inntekt https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/samvaer https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/resultat https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/detaljertBeregning Evaluation tools ================ The evaluator has limited experience with WCAG testing, so the main tools used ar ARC Toolkit and the W3C validator. No screen reader or other tools for assistive technology has been used. Web browsers ============ Google Chrome - Tested with Version 108.0.5359.124 (Official Build) (x86_64) on Mac Samsung Internet - Tested with version 18.0.4.14 on Samsung Galaxy 71 NAV Dekoratøren =============== ARC Toolkit reports reports Alerts(s) any time and Error(s) upon incidents related to Dekoratøren. Those are ignored in this report as they are out of the scope for the "Bidragskalkulator" application being tested. So, even though the evaluation tool reports those, the WCAG 2.1 requirements/guidelines in this report will be set to "Passed" if no other findings are present. Alerts present any time ----------------------- All of the following alerts are present on the "entrance page" of the application being tested i.e. on the https://tjenester.nav.no/bidragskalkulator/innledning page. Many of those alerts are repeating/are present on the other pages too. `` 6  Alert(s)aria-hidden used (ARIAHiddenUsed) Description: An element is hidden from assistive technologies using aria-hidden="true". • WCAG 2.0 A Success Criterion 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value External link • WCAG 2.1 A Success Criterion 4.1.2 Name, Role, Value  `` `` 2  Alert(s)Autocomplete missing (autocompleteMissing) Description: The form field is missing a valid autocomplete="..." attribute. • WCAG 2.1 AA Success Criterion 1.3.5 Identify Input Purpose External link `` `` 1  Alert(s)List with one item (onlyOneListItem) Description: Found an 
     ordered list or 
       unordered list that contains only a single list item. • WCAG 2.0 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships External link • WCAG 2.1 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships  `` `` 2  Alert(s)Empty list item (emptyListItem) Description: The list contains empty 
    •  elements. • WCAG 2.0 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships External link • WCAG 2.1 A Success Criterion 1.3.1 Info and Relationships  `` `` 1  Alert(s)Missing bypass methods (missingBypassMethods) Description: The page appears to be missing common methods used to bypass blocks of content, such as a "skip to main content" link. • WCAG 2.0 A Success Criterion 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks External link • WCAG 2.1 A Success Criterion 2.4.1 Bypass Blocks  `` Error(s) present upon incidents ------------------------------- In addition upon incidents when a message is given to end users of nav.no ARC Toolkit reports an error: `` 1 Error(s)

      Problemer med å kontakte NAV via chat og telefon

      ``
